descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Luka Doncic takes it right at Karl-Anthony Towns and drains a jumper to beat the shot clock.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka puts the moves on KAT to beat the buzzer) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka puts the moves on KAT to beat the buzzer

videos.description: D'Angelo Russell passes ahead to Jarred Vanderbilt for a rim-rocking dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Vanderbilt swings from rim after big slam) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Vanderbilt swings from rim after big slam

videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns rises high to throw down a powerful slam over Maxi Kleber.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KAT flushes thunderous lefty jam) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: KAT flushes thunderous lefty jam

videos.description: Spencer Dinwiddie is bumped on his way to the rim, but gets his shot to drop anyway.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dinwiddie banks home and-1 bucket) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dinwiddie banks home and-1 bucket

videos.description: D'Angelo Russell gets fancy for the hoop and the harm.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (DLo scoops in tough shot in traffic) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: DLo scoops in tough shot in traffic

videos.description: Anthony Edwards uses a sweet Eurostep to finish in the paint.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Anthony Edwards weaves through defense to score) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Anthony Edwards weaves through defense to score

videos.description: Patrick Beverley flexes for the crowd after swatting Dwight Powell's shot from behind.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Beverley fired up after big block) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Beverley fired up after big block

videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns maneuvers around Luka Doncic in the post and throws down a one-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KAT gets by Luka to jam it home) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: KAT gets by Luka to jam it home

videos.description: Luka Doncic connects from beyond the arc despite good defense from D'Angelo Russell.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Doncic drills step-back triple with a hand in his face) 2022/03/26 ESHEET

videos.headline: Doncic drills step-back triple with a hand in his face

videos.description: Anthony Edwards is in awe as he witnesses a fan receive a haircut in the middle of the Timberwolves' game vs. the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Courtside haircut in Minnesota leaves Anthony Edwards flabbergasted) 2022/3/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Courtside haircut in Minnesota leaves Anthony Edwards flabbergasted
